lessons.japanese: パリは世界で最も美しい街である。
lessons.indonesian: Paris is the most beautiful city in the world.

lessons.japanese: ここが前に話した街です。
lessons.indonesian: This is the town I told you about.

lessons.japanese: パリは世界で最も美しい街である。
lessons.indonesian: Paris is the most beautiful city in the world.

lessons.japanese: 空港から中心街までどの電車で行けばよいか教えて下さい。
lessons.indonesian: Please tell me which railway line to use from the airport to downtown.

lessons.japanese: 近くに商店街がありますよ。
lessons.indonesian: There is a shopping area nearby.

lessons.japanese: 休日で車は街道をのろのろと動いた。
lessons.indonesian: The holiday traffic crawled along the highway.

lessons.japanese: 街道は次の村で南へ向かう。
lessons.indonesian: The road tends to the south at the next village.

lessons.japanese: 街を当てもなく歩いた。
lessons.indonesian: I walked about aimlessly on the street.
